title: Boy_Feeder
author: Boy_Feeder
content: DEAR FRIENDS,My tronlink wallet is having more than $ 15000 and it is freezed after depositingI can not transfer but still receive $ USDT from Binance sourceI am really tired and need anyone can help then I will pay the fee ($ 2000) for you if my account can unlockhttps://ibb.co/y5VPcjPhttps://i.ibb.co/XpVLrRL/z3548761865990-449f81b7f7d0f3682e8de165c6590389.jpgEmail: Dttrung16@gmail.com

comments.author: stafstor
comments.body: Using TronLink to receive usdt (trc20). So just wondering someone to explain how did this situation happen and whether it was solved?

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: The image you provided doesn't look like the interface of TronLink to me, I only used it in the extension form which should be something like thisAre you sure that you didn't download a scam Tronlink wallet called TronLink Pro?

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_Feeder on July 07, 2022, 07:30:22 AMDEAR FRIENDS,My tronlink wallet is having more than $ 15000 and it is freezed after depositingI can not transfer but still receive $ USDT from Binance sourceI am really tired and need anyone can help then I will pay the fee ($ 2000) for you if my account can unlockhttps://ibb.co/y5VPcjPEmail: Dttrung16@gmail.comHave you downloaded your wallet from the official site?Have you checked the coin balances in the blockchain explorer?I have seen similar fake wallet scams, so write your TRON wallet address here or in private messages. After viewing the address, I will try to write what is the reason.___But it looks like it's a fake wallet or tokens

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_Feeder on July 07, 2022, 07:30:22 AMDEAR FRIENDS,My tronlink wallet is having more than $ 15000 and it is freezed after depositingI can not transfer but still receive $ USDT from Binance sourceI am really tired and need anyone can help then I will pay the fee ($ 2000) for you if my account can unlockhttps://ibb.co/y5VPcjPEmail: Dttrung16@gmail.comBased on what I saw in the picture you provided it is very undual thing about tronlink, I think the platform you entered is not really teonlin platform but it looks like a phishing site.And I also think it looks like you won't be able to recover that, if you entered a phishing site. The question is, is this asset of yours not released first, dude? I hope it's a miracle that you get that amount you're talking about again.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_Feeder on July 07, 2022, 07:30:22 AMMy tronlink wallet is having more than $ 15000 and it is freezed after depositingI can not transfer but still receive $ USDT from Binance sourceHow much did you deposit? And where did you exactly downloaded this tronlink wallet?The image you provided above is a different wallet compared to Tronlink available on Playstore.There's a possibility that you've been scammed by someone who give you a link with the fake wallet and forcing you to deposit to unfreeze your wallet.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: This thread is a year old and the OP hasn't logged into the forum since the thread was created:Code:Date registered: July 07, 2022, 07:22:53 AMLast active: July 07, 2022, 09:42:19 AMIt seems that he just registered on the forum to create this topic and then left.

comments.author: stafstor
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on July 28, 2023, 04:35:32 PMIt seems that he just registered on the forum to create this topic and then left.Yeah I guess it was some sort of mistake. I have way another interface in original tronlink extension
